author: arnetheduck
content: the thing you've all been waiting for! a (qt-based) GUI for making web3 JSON-RPC requests to your node: https://github.com/arnetheduck/nora-poc - in reality, it's a dummy project for prototyping some particular nim macros, but hey, it works and even runs on android should you need to check something on the go ðŸ™‚

content:

not sure if you have suggestions
